attributes.action: Hold a public referendum on whether or not the "Kelly Report" is enacted.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are few people in the country who are not outraged at recent revelations regarding MP's expenses. No-one else chooses there own expenses structure, though MPs believe that they should.

MPs are employees of the Nation at large, and the Nation at large should determine whether or not they are forced to abide by the terms of the Kelly Report, and not the MPs who will benefit most by rejecting it.
